title: Order and disorder, or, The world made and undone being meditations upon the creation and the fall : as it is recorded in the beginning of Genesis.
author: Apsley, Allen, Sir, 1616-1683.
publisher: Printed by Margaret White for Henry Mortlock ...,
notes: Attributed to Apsley by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
